about_the_game:
Falling Cube plunges you into an adrenaline-pumping adventure where every second counts. Take control of a nimble cube as it plummets through a vibrant and ever-changing universe filled with perilous platforms. Your mission? Navigate this chaotic maze, dodging obstacles at breakneck speeds, and push your limits to achieve the greatest distance possible.

What starts as a smooth descent quickly escalates into a frantic freefall. As your cube accelerates, the challenge intensifies, testing your reflexes and decision-making skills. The platforms ahead become more unpredictable, with each unique pattern requiring precise timing and quick thinking to avoid a catastrophic collision.

In Falling Cube, survival is only half the battle; mastering the art of control and focus is your true goal. As you dive deeper into the game, you’ll face an increasing level of difficulty, where every move demands perfection. Compete against yourself by setting new records, and unlock a variety of 10 unique skins to personalize your cube, adding your own flair to the fast-paced action.

With its addictive gameplay and endless levels, Falling Cube promises hours of excitement. Ready to defy gravity and conquer the fall? Brace yourself for a thrilling ride and see how far you can go!

Main Game Features:

- 10 customizable cube skins
- Unlimited levels with escalating challenges
- Record-breaking gameplay to beat your personal best

name: Falling Cube

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gt 1030
  • Storage: 47 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gt 1030
  • Storage: 47 MB available space
